column5: Was just wondering if any knows the snow and ice conditions from sioux narrows area and west. Any information would be much appreciated. Thanks

Sounds like it was a mess a few days ago...they had plenty of slush, it rained and froze up good..then they got 6-8" of fresh snow on top...we were up a week ago and it was good running but changed to bad and then back to good now....

Little east of you but i think from what i hear its the same everywherr,we just came of a small walleye lake about 3/4 of a mile long,we had water from one end to the other,5-6" of snow floating on top of 4-5 " of water,messy,not much ice either,we were just north of vermilion bay,should tighten up this week,we are going to dip down into the -30,s

Just got another 5" yesterday,and down yo -27c this morning,-30 for the next 4-5 days,really looking forward to that,little milder next week so will get out fishing then aand see what the conditions will like,what does ttt mean
ttt=to the top, bringing the thread back to life.
